alert.note: Alert for Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 5:44PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Brevard County through 615 PM EDT... At 543 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Haulover Canal, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Titusville, Port Saint John, Haulover Canal, and Playalinda Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Occasional to frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!

area.areaDesc: Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands
